BuffsVisible.Description: When dealing frost damage, trigger additional frost damage equal to 4,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Deals additional Flame DMG equal to 10,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Physical damage dealt to targets affected by Force Impact is increased by 15%.
Not Dropped: There are occasionally strong winds that blow units into the air, ignoring hyperbody.
When dealing physical damage, trigger additional physical damage equal to 4,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Outgoing healing is increased by 15%.
Apply a damage reflection effect every 30 seconds, gaining 200% damage reflection for 15 seconds.
Flame damage dealt to targets affected by Force Impact is increased by 15%.
When dealing flame damage, trigger additional flame damage equal to 4,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Deals additional Frost DMG equal to 10,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Frost damage dealt to targets affected by Armor Dissolve is increased by 15%.
Not Dropped: The Wanderer gets burned over time, losing 1% of Max HP every second.
When dealing volt damage, trigger additional volt damage equal to 4,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Deals additional Volt DMG equal to 10,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Become heavier and cannot be blown into the air.
Volt damage dealt to targets affected by Armor Dissolve is increased by 15%.
Deals additional Frost DMG equal to 8,000% of ATK when hit by Frost attacks. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1s.
Deals additional Physical DMG equal to 10,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Recover 1.2% HP every second.\r\nNote: Affected by healing buffs and debuffs.
Not Dropped: There are frequent strong winds that blow units into the air, ignoring hyperbody.
Deals additional Physical DMG equal to 8,000% of ATK when hit by physical attacks. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1s.
After battle begins, ATK increases by 10%.
Reduce target's final damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Not Dropped: Without Benediction Resonance, healing effect is decreased by 80%.
Deals additional Flame DMG equal to 8,000% of ATK when hit by Flame attacks. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1s.
Deals additional Altered DMG equal to 10,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Every 40 seconds, cast a Black Hole at the locked-on target for 20 seconds, dealing damage equal to 200% of ATK every second.
Damage received by self and nearby allies is reduced by 10%.
When dealing volt damage, triggers additional volt damage equal to 8,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Deals additional Flame DMG equal to 15,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Reduce endurance consumption by 30% and increase movement speed by 20%.
Not Dropped: Decrease the damage of non-Fortitude units targeted by enemies.
Deals additional Frost DMG equal to 12,000% of ATK when hit by Frost attacks. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1s.
Deals additional Frost DMG equal to 15,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Increase damage received by 30%, and increase shatter by 100%.
Not Dropped: There are frequent strong winds that blow units into the air, ignoring hyperbody.
When dealing physical damage, triggers additional physical damage equal to 12,000% of ATK, unaffected by any buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1 second.
Deals additional Volt DMG equal to 15,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Upon hit, confine the target for 5 seconds. For every 1 meter the target moves, the target takes damage equal to 200% of your ATK. Damage dealt every second will not exceed 400%.
Reduce the Wanderer's damage taken by 10%. Every 10 seconds, forcefully taunt targets within a 10-meter radius, lasting for 3 seconds.
Deals additional Flame DMG equal to 12,000% of ATK when hit by Flame attacks. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 1s.
Outgoing healing is increased by 30%.

Deals additional Physical DMG equal to 15,000% of ATK upon hitting the target. Unaffected by buffs or debuffs. Cooldown: 2s.
Deal damage equal to100% of ATK to nearby targets every second.
[Not Dropped] Continuously lose HP. Lose 5% of Max HP every second, and HP recovery is reduced by 80%. Courageous Heart doubles HP recovery effects.
